content:
hello, where in the lean or standard lib can I find a theorem that says two Arrays are equal if their corresponding elements are equal?

I would like to avoid assuming Decidable equality.
(If this is not available, where can I find the equivalent one for Lists)
docs#Array.ext I think, ext is extensionality which is the roughly the property that things are equal if their contents are

Alex J. Best said:

docs#Array.ext I think, ext is extensionality which is the roughly the property that things are equal if their contents are

this is perfect thanks!
Somo S. has marked this topic as resolved.
